abstract: Steve Jobs, the innovative force behind Apple Computers, grew up in San Francisco but traced his roots back to Syria.
snippet: Steve Jobs, the innovative force behind Apple Computers, grew up in San Francisco but traced his roots back to Syria.
lead_paragraph: Steve Jobs, the innovative force behind Apple, grew up in San Francisco but traced his roots back to Syria. It was a fact that many Syrians celebrated on Thursday even as they mourned his death and lamented how the political crisis gripping the country made it unlikely that a future Steve Jobs would emerge from Syria and stay there.

headline.main: Steve Jobs, Son of a Syrian, Is Embraced in the Arab World
